text: Stop us if this sounds familiar : An American actress with a fancy title spent Thursday schmoozing with England ’ s elite while dressed to the nines in an off - white ensemble at a royal event. This time, however, it ’ s not Meghan Markle — it ’ s Angelina Jolie. The Oscar winner was made an honorary dame by Queen Elizabeth in 2014 in recognition of her humanitarian work. A few years later, she ’ s representing those royal ties by attending a formal service at St. Paul ’ s Cathedral in London. The event marks the 200th anniversary of the Most Distinguished Order of St. Michael and St. George, which honors nonmilitary service in a foreign country. Angelina Jolie wore Ralph Russo for the event Photo : Jeff Spicer / Getty Images Angelina Jolie wore
